page.description: Specifies the id of this List's parent list.

section.description: For example, there are two controls one named 'parent' the other 'child'.
Highlight the [child] control and click on [...] button next to the List properties property to open the List Builder.
Go to the Data Source tab on the List Builder. Check the 'Has parent list' checkbox.
To set the 'parent' control to be the parent of the 'child' control simply select parent from the dropdown list. This dropdown will show the names of all the possible parent controls.
